data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 17491, Version Hash: 94bdaea25aa31a3d69a408a644701345e9ff7a83
data.actual_result: The player goes into fullscreen mode for a split second, then exits, then you jump to the top of the page again, and then the video starts over again. Also if you ARE in fullscreen mode and press esc, you exit fullscreen, go to the top, and the video starts over. The same thing also happens when you've started a youtube video and the page gets updated (someone starts/stops playing a game)
data.expected_result: The video is supposed to enter fullscreen mode and keep playing
data.short_description: Pressing F while watching a YouTube video in the Games tab makes the video restart
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Games tab - Play a YouTube video - Pause and play the video to make it focused (else the player won't recognize the keystrokes) - press F
